text: Clive Norbert Loveland (born 1934), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the javelin at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:English male javelin throwers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Clive Loveland
